instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message:
Anyone have one they could email me?

Thanks in advance. 

Thomas

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message:
Hello [URL="https://www.rossmanngroup.com/boards/member/682-2informaticos"]2informaticos[/URL],

The file does not work. Do you have another one or does anyone else?

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message: You have other problem, not BIOS related maybe...

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message:
Verified the file is BAD on another MacBook that is working perfect, just to rule out the file I was given is confirmed BAD or is not for an 820-00165. I get fan spin but no video, no chime. 

I still need another BIOS file with a clean ME for an 820-00165, or if anyone can clean the ME region for me on an 820-00165 BIOS file, anything is appreciated.

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message:
Did you write the dump as is?
Do not change serial or anything else.
Once boots OK, then you can change ssn...

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message: I wrote it as is. It is a BAD file, try it yourself, you will see.

threads.title: 820-00165 EFI File needed with clean ME region
threads.message:
If you have an working board, swap the ME region from your backup to its BIOS.
Or upload somewhere backup and working BIOS...
